analyzeResult.content:
PHILIP MORRIS U.S.A. INTER - OFFICE CORRESPONDENCE RICHMOND, VIRGINIA
Date: August 20, 1971
To ::
Mr. L. Meyer
"From:
J. E. Wickham
Subject: Home Testing Institute Samples 2229 vs 2230 2229 = Red Q86 and Black L13 2230 = Red L13 and Black Q86
This test was rejected and will be remade. The reconstituted tobacco content of the experimental Marlboro 85 cigarettes (2230) was lower than specified. Also, the tar deliveries of both samples were approximately 1 mg lower than normal production Marlboro 85 cigarettes as reported in CI 7-71.

lines.content: Subject: Home Testing Institute Samples 2229 vs 2230
This test was rejected and will be remade. The reconstituted
tobacco content of the experimental Marlboro 85 cigarettes (2230)
was lower than specified. Also, the tar deliveries of both
samples were approximately 1 mg lower than normal production
Marlboro 85 cigarettes as reported in CI 7-71.

paragraphs.content: PHILIP MORRIS U.S.A. INTER - OFFICE CORRESPONDENCE RICHMOND, VIRGINIA
Subject: Home Testing Institute Samples 2229 vs 2230 2229 = Red Q86 and Black L13 2230 = Red L13 and Black Q86

This test was rejected and will be remade. The reconstituted tobacco content of the experimental Marlboro 85 cigarettes (2230) was lower than specified. Also, the tar deliveries of both samples were approximately 1 mg lower than normal production Marlboro 85 cigarettes as reported in CI 7-71.
